title: WHERE MY IP BOOST
body: I CONFIRMED MY HOTMAIL STILL NO P BOOST WTF{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: It may take about a day for your IP redemption to process after you've verified your email.  Try performing a relog as a first step, otherwise, hang tight until tomorrow.  Don't worry, the boost will be applied after email redemption one way or another.  :D
